title: Barack Obama's Watchface
description: This watchface looks exactly like Jorg Gray JG6500 U.S. Secret Service Edition - the famous watch owned by the President of the United States of America Barack Obama. You can find it in Google: http://goo.gl/2MWdahIf you prefer the functionality not the classical look you can customize the watchface. Additional clocks can show not only hours, minutes and seconds but also the watch battery level and the phone battery level. Also the outer scale of the watch face can be used as a compass.The Ambient Mode is customizable. You can select one of the options:- The full JG6500 watchface.- Simple analog watchface.- Digital watchface.This is an ideal choice if you prefer a dark watch face or a black watch face. Also JG6500 is very contrast watch face. This is a unique watch face on Google Play which is the authentic copy of the real JG6500 watch.Please wait a couple minutes after installation to allow the watchface be transfered to the watch via Bluetooth.IMPORTANT: You may have to start the app installed on your smartphone to enable the phone battery level measurement service.Tip: To configure the watchface you have to press the small gear under the watchface preview screen on your smartwatch.
descriptionHTML:
This watchface looks exactly like Jorg Gray JG6500 U.S. Secret Service Edition - the famous watch owned by the President of the United States of America Barack Obama. You can find it in Google: http://goo.gl/2MWdah

If you prefer the functionality not the classical look you can customize the watchface. Additional clocks can show not only hours, minutes and seconds but also the watch battery level and the phone battery level. Also the outer scale of the watch face can be used as a compass.
The Ambient Mode is customizable. You can select one of the options:
- The full JG6500 watchface.
- Simple analog watchface.
- Digital watchface.

This is an ideal choice if you prefer a dark watch face or a black watch face. Also JG6500 is very contrast watch face. This is a unique watch face on Google Play which is the authentic copy of the real JG6500 watch.

Please wait a couple minutes after installation to allow the watchface be transfered to the watch via Bluetooth.

IMPORTANT: You may have to start the app installed on your smartphone to enable the phone battery level measurement service.
Tip: To configure the watchface you have to press the small gear under the watchface preview screen on your smartwatch.
comments: Wastes soo much baterrryyy All gone in like 1hr
I can build better faves at watchmakers. Dont waist your money.

Compass mode and phone battery not working on Huawei Watch. The compass scale appears but doesnt move. Phone battery level is always at 100%. Would be great if it has more features such as Steps counter, calories and weather... And maybe an option to hide the watch icon from the App Drawer. But I am still using it as I simply love the design!

A bit touch up maybe? It's cool for sure but it looks a bit cluttered on LG Urbane because of the details on the edge... and I wish there's options to add glow effect to hour and minute hand. It's a bit hard to see sometimes with most details are overlapping in white colour as well

I was really looking forward to seeing how this looke don my Moto 360. The idea is great and it's such a beautiful design for a watch but this face doesn't do it justice. It's almost there but the image doesn't seem to be sharp enough. The dullness actually makes it a little hard to tell the time, every time my watch lights up I actually strain my eyes a little trying to figure it out. I know it must be difficult with all the black, but the watch could benefit from some sort of shadow, make the hands a little more 3D

Most stuff are fake Compass is fake "W"is always at 0900 and does not move. Batteries for phone and watch don't work. Timer for on/off can't be adjust. The only thing good about this watch is the look. But it is over price at $2 I kept it because I like the way it looks.
